name: Dining Room
longDes: You enter a formal dining room. There is a large oak ^table# in the center of the room with many sturdy-looking teak chairs surrounding it. There is a large ^north window# and one ^east window#. The walls in this room are surprisingly bare, with the exception of a ^painting# of some men with dogs on the Western wall. There is a large set of double doors to the $South# leading to the parlor. To the $West# is a door leading to the kitchen.
shortDes: You are in the mansion dining room. A large ^table# and set of chairs dominate the room. There is a ^painting# adorning the east wall with what appears to be a fox hunt. There is a north window here as well as an east window. To the $West# is a door to the house kitchen. To the $South# is a doorway to the parlor.

features.name: painting
features.preActionDes: You look at the painting. It is a traditional English fox hunt. There is a horse with a mounted hunter. There is also a large pack of dogs chasing a fox. One ^dog# in the painting seems very strange.

features.name: dog
features.preActionDes: You look closer at the dog. It's got three heads and glowing, red eyes! You feel a shiver and sense of revulsion, which thankfully passes quickly.

features.name: table
features.preActionDes: You look at the table. There isn't anything remarkable.

features.name: north window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. You can see a rose garden and a gazebo.

features.name: east window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. All you can see is the first row of trees in a forest.
